Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. However, I understand the value you place on this product might vary. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
